titles.title: To amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to provide that the 2 percent reduction in annuity for each year a Federal employee is under 55 years of age at the time of retiring be eliminated if the separation is due to a reduction in force.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.

bill.summary: 4/14/1994--Introduced. Amends Federal employees' retirement law to declare certain reductions in annuities inapplicable to employees under 55 years of age whose separation is due to a reduction in force.
